sentence: GOP in-fighting intensified yesterday with Trump endorsing two primary challengers taking on sitting House Republicans: Katie Arrington, who is challenging South Carolina Rep. Nancy Mace, and Loren Culp, who is taking on Washington Rep. Dan Newhouse, one of the 10 House Republicans who voted to impeach Trump after Jan. 6.
title: Congressional leaders race to catch up to stock ban momentum

sentence: * Versus U.S. Representative Dan Newhouse * Aug. 2 Republican primary for Washington's 4th congressional district Trump's pick to challenge Newhouse is former small-town police chief Loren Culp, who in March called for the execution of a Black man accused of badly injuring a woman by throwing her down the stairs of a train station.
author: Reuters
title: Factbox: Trump's endorsement power faces test in key elections

sentence: Formerly an unsuccessful candidate for governor, Loren Culp is challenging incumbent GOP Rep. Dan Newhouse, who voted for Trump's impeachment after the Capitol riot.
title: Tracking Trump's endorsements in the 2022 midterm election
